title: Trump Administration Proposes Transportation Rule that Would Force Americans to Pay More at Pump
description:
In Addition to Rising Costs, Less Fuel-Efficient Vehicles Also Increase Air Pollution & Worsen Public Health WASHINGTON, D.C. — Today, the Trump administration proposed a rule that would roll back federal Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) standards, commonly known as fuel economy standards. Transportation is the second largest household expenditure behind housing for American ... [continued]

The post Trump Administration Proposes Transportation Rule that Would Force Americans to Pay More at Pump appeared first on CleanTechnica.
